title: Grain salad lettuce cups (Dani Valent)

ingredients.content: 1 tsp sea salt flakes, plus extra to taste
½ tsp  ground black pepper, plus extra to taste
2 kale leaves, stalks removed and leaves cut into thin slices
6 sprigs fresh basil, leaves only, cut into thin strips

preparations.content: Place a ceramic or glass bowl onto mixing bowl lid, weigh shiitake mushrooms and hot water into it, then set aside to soak (approx. 30 minutes) while cooking farro.
Place farro into mixing bowl and toast <b>5 min/Varoma/speed 1<b>. Transfer toasted farro into simmering basket.
Place stock paste and 600 g of the water into mixing bowl. Insert simmering basket with farro and cook <b>10 min/Varoma/speed 1<b>.
Add lentils to simmering basket and cook for a further <b>15 min/Varoma/speed 1<b>. Stir contents of simmering basket.
Drain reserved mushrooms, reserving soaking liquid. Remove and discard woody stalks from mushrooms, then cut mushroom caps into pieces.
Add mushrooms and quinoa to simmering basket and pour soaking liquid over grains in simmering basket and cook <b>17 min/Varoma/speed 1<b>.
Pour remaining 600 g water over grains in simmering basket, stir grains and cook for a further <b>6 min/Varoma/speed 1<b>.

Place Varoma dish into position, place prawns into it, secure Varoma lid and steam <b>8 min/Varoma/speed 1<b> or until grains and prawns are just cooked. Remove Varoma dish and cut prawns into pieces (approx. 2 cm).
Transfer grains into a large bowl and toss with olive oil, salt, pepper, kale, basil and lemon juice. Set aside to cool slightly (approx. 10 minutes).
Spoon grain salad into 12 baby cos leaves. Top with prawns and crumbled feta, and season with extra salt and pepper before serving.

hintsAndTricks: Please refer to The Basic Cookbook or Everyday Cookbook for the Vegetable stock paste recipe.
You can substitute mint leaves for basil leaves, if desired.
<b>Vegetarian<b>: omit prawns in step 8 and proceed as per recipe, without using Varoma dish.
